SKT_FIRST.name: Power of Light
SKT_FIRST.true_desc:
Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuff(s)</color> from all allies.
 Also heals the ally with the lowest Health for <color=#28d9ed>5%</color>.
Inflict <color=#28d9ed>Execution Time!</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turns(s)</color>.

<color=#28d9ed>Execution time!</color>: Increases damage taken from Earth enemies.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제합니다.\n또한 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 체력을 <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> 회복시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除する。\nまた、残りHPが最も低い味方単体のHPを<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>回復する。

SKT_SECOND.name: Gaze Upon Us
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Heals all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> of Saeran's Max Health. Additionally, recovers all other allies' <color=#28d9ed>Action Points</color> by <color=#28d9ed>25</color>. Removes <color=#28d9ed>1</color><color=#28d9ed>Debuff</color>of all Earth allies including the caster and grants <color=#28d9ed>Sustained Recovery</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1</color> turn(s). (The amount of healing is proportional to the target's Max Health).
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 세이란 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>만큼 회복시키고, 세이란을 제외한 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>AP</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>25</color> 회복시킵니다.
그리고 모든 지속성 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제시키고, <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color>동안 <color=#28d9ed>지속 회복</color>을 걸어줍니다. (대상의 최대 체력에 비례하여 회복합니다.)
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を【セイラン】の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>回復させ、【セイラン】を除く味方全体が<color=#28d9ed>AP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>25</color>獲得する。\nまた、持続性味方の <color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除し、<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間<color=#28d9ed>継続回復</color>を付与する。(回復量は対象の最大HPが高いほどUP)

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Removes all debuffs from the target
SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 対象のすべての弱体効果解除

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Arise
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Heals one ally by <color=#28d9ed>55%</color> and reduces the target's <color=#28d9ed>Skill Cooldown</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1turns(s)</color>. Additionally, removes all of the target's <color=#28d9ed>Debuff</color> and increases the target's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>50%</color>. \nGrants <color=#28d9ed>Invulnerability</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Increase Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color> if the target is an Earth ally.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 아군 한 명의 체력을 <color=#28d9ed>55%</color> 회복시킨 후, 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>스킬 쿨타임</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소시킵니다. 그리고 대상의 모든 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color>를 해제하고 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 증가시킵니다.\n대상이 지속성인 경우 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color>동안 <color=#28d9ed>무적</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>증가를 부여합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 味方単体のHPを<color=#28d9ed>55%</color>回復させた後、対象の<color=#28d9ed>スキルターン</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少させる。また、対象のすべての<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>を解除し、<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>UPさせる。\n地属性対象に<color=#28d9ed>無敵</color>と<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力UP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。

5_jp: 対象のスキルターン-1ターン

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase all allies' Attack for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuff(s)</color> from all allies.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체의 공격력이 증가합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で味方全体の攻撃力が<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPする。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除する。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
